message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale for only $10000. It's a great opportunity to invest in something valuable. This is my first sale, so you're getting in on the ground floor! Are you interested?

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to be your first customer, but I'm hesitant to buy without any information on the quality of the product.  Since this is your first sale and there's no sales history to look at, I'd like to see some proof of the product's quality before making a decision. Perhaps you could offer a guarantee or a sample?
